product_name: The Needles: A Climber's Guide to the Black Hills Needles
long_description: Complete with epic photos and detailed information, this full-color guide navigates the spindly spires of the Black Hills Needles. Authors: Zach Orenczak and Rachel Lynn. Softcover; 191 pages; color photos and maps. Extreme Angles LLC; copyright 2006. Located in the southwest corner of South Dakota, the Black Hills Needles offers climbers easy access and unique topography. Color-coded divisions chart the Hwy 87 corridor. Authors dissect each spire with a general description, suggested approach and descent, special tips and required gear. Easy-to-read maps provide not only routes up the spires but also area overviews describing the best sequence to attempt multiple climbs.
short_description: Complete with epic photos and detailed information, this full-color guide navigates the spindly spires of the Black Hills Needles.
